-- mod/mod.test/dep@v1.0.0/go.mod --
module mod.test/dep

-- mod/mod.test/dep@v1.0.0/inner/inner.go --
package inner

type Dep struct {}

-- mod/mod.test/module@v0.0.1/go.mod --
module mod.test/module

require (
  mod.test/dep v1.0.0
)

-- mod/mod.test/module@v0.0.1/struct.go --
package module

type Struct struct {
}

-- mod/mod.test/module@v0.0.2/go.mod --
module mod.test/module

require (
  mod.test/dep v1.0.0
)

-- mod/mod.test/module@v0.0.2/struct.go --
package module

import "mod.test/dep/inner"

type Struct struct {
  inner.Dep
}

-- app/go.mod --
module app.com

require (
  mod.test/module v0.0.2
)

-- app/hello/hello.go --
package hello

import (
  "mod.test/module"
)

type A struct {
  S *module.Struct
}
